Ahmad Dhani Bantah Bakal Maju Pilkada Kota Surabaya 2020
04 Nov 2019, 09:25 by Lani Diana Wijaya, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Rekan musisi Ahmad Dhani, Lieus Sungkharisma, membantah kabar bahwa pentolan grup Band Dewa 19 tersebut bakal maju dalam pemilihan kepala daerah (pilkada) Wali Kota Surabaya 2020. Lieus menyatakan bahwa rekannya itu saat ini tengah fokus menjalani masa hukumannya di Rutan Cipinang.
"Tegas dia mengatakan tidak pernah ada niatan dan tidak pernah menyuruh siapapun untuk menjadi calon Wali Kota Surabaya," kata Lieus usai menjenguk Dhani di Rumah Tahanan Cipinang, Jakarta Timur, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Lieus menyampaikan, dalam pertemuannya siang tadi, Dhani meminta dirinya mengklarifikasi kabar soal dirinya maju dalam Pilkada Wali Kota Surabaya.
"Dia pesan, 'benar Lieus kasih tau teman-teman pers, gue enggak ada keinginan untuk itu'," ucap Lieus menirukan pesan Dhani.
Sebelumnya, Dhani disebut-sebut bakal maju dalam pemilihan Wali Kota Surabaya 2020. Seorang yang mengaku utusan Dhani dikabarkan telah mengambil formulir pendaftaran calon Wali Kota Surabaya. Formulir diambil ke Dewan Pimpinan Cabang (DPC) Partai Gerindra Surabaya.
Dhani sendiri masih mendekam di balik jeruji besi karena kasus penghinaan terhadap anggota Koalisi Elemen Bela NKRI. Dhani menyebut mereka sebagai idiot dalam vlognya setelah koalisi tersebut mengepung Hotel Majapahit, Surabaya, tempat Dhani menginap pada Agustus 2018.
Suami dari Mulan Jameela tersebut divonis bersalah melanggar Pasal 45 ayat 3 juncto Pasal 27 ayat 3 Undang-Undang ITE. Majelis hakim Pengadilan Negeri Surabaya menjatuhkan hukuman 1 tahun kepada musisi pendukung pasangan Prabowo Subianto - Sandiaga Uno pada pemilu lalu tersebut.

Ahmad Dhani Denies going Forward Surabaya City Election 2020
04 Nov 2019, 09:25 by Lani Diana Wijaya, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Fellow musician Ahmad Dhani, Lieus Sungkharisma, has denied the news that the band Dewa 19 frontman will advance in the Mayoral elections in Surabaya. Lieus stated that his colleague was currently focusing on serving his sentence in Cipinang Detention Center.
"He firmly said there was never any intention and never asked anyone to become a candidate for Mayor of Surabaya," Lieus said after visiting Dhani at the Cipinang Detention House, East Jakarta, Monday, November 4, 2019.
Lieus conveyed, in his meeting this afternoon, Dhani asked him to clarify the news about him advancing in the Surabaya City Election.
"He ordered, 'It's true Lieus told friends of the press, I have no desire for that'," Lieus mimicked Dhani's message.
Previously, Dhani was said to be going forward in the election of the Surabaya Mayor in 2020. A person who claimed that Dhani's delegation was said to have taken the registration form for the candidate for Surabaya Mayor. The form was taken to the Surabaya Gerindra Party Branch Leadership Board (DPC).
Dhani himself is still behind bars because of the case of insults to members of the Republic of Indonesia Defense Elementary Coalition. Dhani called them idiots in his vlog after the coalition surrounded the Majapahit Hotel, Surabaya, where Dhani stayed in August 2018.
The husband of Mulan Jameela was found guilty of violating Article 45 paragraph 3 in conjunction with Article 27 paragraph 3 of the ITE Law. The Surabaya District Court panel of judges handed down a 1-year sentence to musicians supporting the pair Prabowo Subianto - Sandiaga Uno in the last election.
